means: 使位于，使处于…地位（位置）

sentence.Network_en: The home is situated within easy access of shops and other facilities.
sentence.Network_cn: 房子位置便利，距离商店及其他设施都不远。

sentence.Network_en: The Oriental is a comfortable hotel, but rather inconveniently situated.
sentence.Network_cn: 东方大酒店是个舒适的宾馆，但地理位置却非常不方便。

sentence.Network_en: Camp sites are usually situated along the coast, close to beaches.
sentence.Network_cn: 野营地一般都位于海滨，靠近沙滩。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语六级词汇表_大学六级 ... sitting-room n． 起居室 situated a． 位于…的 situation n． 位置；处境；形势 n．(建筑物等的)位置.

大学英语六级词汇 s_在线英语听力室 ... sip n.啜饮，呷，啜 v.一呷之量 situated a.坐落(某处)，位于…的 skeleton n.骨骼，骨架.

list.abs: 经济形势(Economic situation)经济形势是指国家宏观经济的运行状况和走向。经济运行分析是经济决策的核心。正确分析经济形势对于提高决策的前瞻性、科学性和有效性都具有.
人教版英语九年级重点词组 - 豆丁网 ... friends with 与…交朋友 12、 social situations 社会环境 16、 right away 立刻，马上 18、.
货运险中英文对照表-会员专区-中国风险管理网 ... Actual Tare 实际皮重 Actual Situation 实际情况 Actual Total Loss 实际全损.
SWIRE BEVERAGES SAP 资金管理 - MBA智库文档 ... Risk controller 风险控制者 Financial situation 财务状况 deteriorates 恶化.

entry.def: If something is situated in a particular place or position, it is in that place or position.

example.ex: His hotel is situated in one of the loveliest places on the Loire...
example.tran: 他下榻的旅馆位于卢瓦河畔最漂亮的地方之一。

example.ex: The pain was situated above and around the eyes...
example.tran: 眼睛的上方和四周都很疼。

means.word_mean: 1. situated in a particular spot or position;

auth_sentence.content: An undistinguished modern building situated...next to a petrol station.
auth_sentence.res_content: An undistinguished modern building situated...next to a petrol station.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An undistinguished modern building situated...next to a petrol station.

auth_sentence.content: Peter and Paul, situated less than two miles away.
auth_sentence.res_content: Peter and Paul, situated less than two miles away.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Peter and Paul, situated less than two miles away.

auth_sentence.content: The pool, situated between the twins, is shown.
auth_sentence.res_content: The pool, situated between the twins, is shown.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The pool, situated between the twins, is shown.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常在动词后,"有……的,被……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通常的,习惯的,按照风俗习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accustom使习惯+ed有……的,被……的→通常的,习惯的
ally同盟者+ed有……的,被……的→allied联合的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耕耘的,有教养的,栽植的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cultivate耕耘,栽植+ed有……的,被……的→cultivated耕耘的
harden变硬+ed有……的,被……的→adj.变硬的,坚毅的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受伤的,受损害的,受委屈的
感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest兴趣,关心+ed有……的,被……的→adj.感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
limit限制+ed有……的,被……的→adj.有限的,被限制的
note注意到+ed有……的,被……的→被注意的→著名的
pack打包+ed有……的,被……的→adj.充满……的,塞满了……的
repeat重复,反复+ed有……的,被……的→adj.重复的,再三的
suppose猜想,推测+ed有……的,被……的→adj.假定的,假像的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wick+ed有……的,被……的→adj.坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
fix固定+ed有……的,被……的→adj.固定的,确定的

Sentence.sentence: It is situated at the foot of a beautiful mountain.

jushi.english: The buffet is situated in the centre of the train.
Having six children and no income,the widow was badly situated.
jushi.chinese: 这个寡妇有六个子女而且又没有收入，处境艰难。

jushi.english: His villa is situated at the mouth of a river.
